surface_layer.definition: A set of rules or procedures used to compensate for signal distortion and loss in a communication channel.

deep_layer.mechanism: Equalization protocols adjust the transmitted signal to counteract the effects of the channel, ensuring reliable data reception.
deep_layer.origin: Developed to improve signal integrity in high-speed communication systems.

epistemic_metadata.source: PCIe® 5.0 Protocol and Electrical Compliance Testing Deep Dive
